title: Doggo v0
subtitle: Robotic
description: Low-cost legged Robot dog with 12 joints powered by SG90 servo motors that is controlled by Raspberry Pi/Arduino. Aim to develop simple walking and standing capability with it. Designed with custom kinematics.

title: Hand Cursor
subtitle: Computer Vision
description: Control your cursor and click with your hands only, without a mouse. Just wave your hands and do a pinch gesture to your webcam will do.

title: Frontline Fighters
subtitle: Tech
description: Retro GBA Game developed in C and assembly language. The program uses button interrupts and game timer running at 10ms for optimal performance. Go on an adventurous journey as a frontline fighter, solving challenging puzzles and battling against viruses across each level, as the difficulty increases.

title: Train Solo8 to Walk
subtitle: Robotic
description: Use of Deep Reinforcement Learning to teach open source legged robot design Solo 8 to walk on both flat and rough terrain. Mujoco gym is used to emulate the physics to train the agent to walk, it is rewarded for distance and speed, while punished for idling, falling and veering off course.

title: Bumblebee AUV 4.0
subtitle: NUS Team Bumblebee
description: Principle hull and structure designer of the 4th Generation Bumblebee Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV). Encompassing design, structure rigidity and strength. Validated through Finite Element Analysis and Computation Fluid Dynamic Simulations.

title: Hornet AUV 4.0
subtitle: NUS Team Bumblebee - Trainee
description: Hornet 4.0 is the 4th iteration of the NUS Bumblebee freshmen programme. Came up with the frame design and integration of the vehicle within 8 months for the Singapore Autonomous Underwater Vehicle Competition (SAUVC 2018) with limited budgets.

title: ROS Gazebo
subtitle: Robotic
description: University Project using Robotic Operating System (ROS) Gazebo Virtual Simulator to implement a critically damped PID controller for Husky Robot. Followed by use of TurtleBot to navigate and solve maze in the most efficient method using Breath-First-Search.

title: ROS Co-Op Gazebo
subtitle: Robotic
description: ROS Gazebo Co-Operation between UAV and TurtleBot to reach the target goal. It is completed as a university project using Robotic Operating System (ROS). Work includes PID control tuning, sensor data transformation, Kalman filter, finite-state-machine and etc.

title: Virtual HPL Factory
subtitle: Industrial 4.0
description: Virtual Hyper-Personalization Line (HPL) Factory of a smart shoe cabinet, from raw material to customizable assembly according to order using cloud technology and robotic for Smart Manufacturing.

title: AR FPI Guide
subtitle: Mixed Reality
description: Augmented Reality App deployed on Microsoft Hololens to use as guide for training inspector to conduct Fluorescent Penetrant Inspection. Developed in Unity, while manipulating UR5 Cobot via socket for automated wipe-off.

title: RoboSub 2020
subtitle: NUS Team Bumblebee
description: Compilation of the design and development of an entirely new BBAUV 4.0 for the RoboSub 2020. Made with funny antic to show the resilient through the pandemic.

title: RoboSub 2021
subtitle: NUS Team Bumblebee
description: Team video presenting the development and modification made to the existing BBAUV 3.5X for the RoboSub 2019. Development is made possible through the cumulative hard work of Bumblebee members.

title: Soft Robotic Actuators
subtitle: Robotic
description: DIY soft robotic actuators made using household items such as duct tape and cardboards. Two types was demonstrated, bending and extending actuator powered by pneumatic.

title: iConnect Biz Idea
subtitle: Entrepreneurship
description: Product or service ideation project to foster how to start and manage a start-up. A module offered by Ngee Ann Poly School of Business and Accounting for dissertation of minor in Business.

title: Mobile Soft Robotic
subtitle: Robotic
description: Mobile soft robotic is a project to develop a soft robotic arm that can be controlled by a mobile phone. The soft robotic arm is made from soft materials such as silicone and rubber.

title: GRID - Mobile Organiser
subtitle: Product Design
description: Product Design Submission to Hyundai-NTU 3D Print challenge 2022. It was inspired by the Ioniq 5 grid headlight design, that allows for easy of reconfiguration and attachment system.

title: Pay Anything
subtitle: UI/UX Design
description: PayAnything is a mobile app that allows users to pay for anything, anywhere, anytime. The idea of the app is to auto detect the mode of payment that has the best deal for the user. Designed using Figma.

title: DigiVerify
subtitle: UI/UX Design
description: DigiVerify is a mobile app that allows users to verify their identity. Name sequence and verification is one of the most common problem in KYC process, DigiVerify is a solution to this problem. Designed using Figma.
